sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.enroll_year, student.gender, major.major_name FROM student JOIN major ON student.major_id = major.id WHERE student.enroll_year = 2022 AND student.gender = '男' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.major_name, COUNT(*) AS student_count FROM base WHERE base.major_name = '计算机科学与技术' GROUP BY base.major_name

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“入学年份（常见问法：22级）”映射
根据字段描述“专业名称，专业实体映射主字段”映射
根据字段描述“性别（男/女等）”映射

output.executed_sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.enroll_year, student.gender, major.major_name FROM student JOIN major ON student.major_id = major.id WHERE student.enroll_year = 2022 AND student.gender = '男' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.major_name, COUNT(*) AS student_count FROM base WHERE base.major_name = '计算机科学与技术' GROUP BY base.major_name
